about_me.bio: I’m Shreyas, an Information Science & Engineering student with hands-on experience in Python programming and a strong enthusiasm for blockchain technology. I’m passionate about building blockchain-based products and exploring decentralized applications. Alongside this, I have a solid understanding of web development and enjoy turning ideas into functional, user-friendly solutions. Always curious, always building.

projects.title: Terminalfolio
projects.description: A terminal-inspired portfolio template with typing effects and command navigation.

projects.title: Realtime Chat
projects.description: Lightweight chat UI using serverless APIs and optimistic updates.

projects.title: Charts Dashboard
projects.description: Responsive dashboards with accessible charts built on Recharts.
